title: Universal Content Extraction - Simple Document
description: Verify that the system correctly extracts and preserves text from a simple DOCX document without tables or images.

steps.description: Import a simple DOCX document containing plain text paragraphs.
Check that all text is extracted completely and formatting such as bold and italics is preserved.

title: Universal Content Extraction - Complex Document with Tables and Equations
description: Ensure extraction and preservation of complex nested tables, images, and equations from PDF input with styling intact.

steps.description: Import a PDF file containing nested tables, inline equations, and images with styled text.
Validate that all tables are detected and represented with correct JSON structure, equations are preserved, and images are captured with style.

title: Multilingual Support - Hindi-English Bilingual Content
description: Verify that the system preserves multilingual content including Hindi and English with correct font rendering and special characters.

steps.description: Import a document containing mixed Hindi and English paragraphs with complex font styles.
Check that all bilingual text is preserved accurately with proper fonts and no data loss.

title: AI-Powered Question Detection Accuracy
description: Validate AI detection correctly identifies question boundaries, types (MCQ, short answer, etc.), topics, marks, and contextual associations.

steps.description: Upload a document with a diverse set of questions including various question types and topics.
Measure AI detection accuracy and verify that above 95% of questions are correctly classified with accurate metadata.

title: Rich Database Schema Storage and Retrieval
description: Test that the database stores complex question objects with tables, images, equations, metadata, and supports retrieval within 500ms.

steps.description: Save a complex question containing nested tables, images, and mathematical equations to the database.
Query the database for the saved question using multiple criteria filter.
Verify that the returned question data is complete, correct, and query response time is under 500 milliseconds.

title: Bulk Import and Batch Edit with AI Suggestions
description: Ensure bulk import of 100+ questions works reliably with AI-generated batch editing suggestions and displays clear status feedback.

steps.description: Import a batch file containing 150 questions in supported formats.
Apply AI suggestions to perform batch edits on the imported questions.
Check that all questions are properly imported and edited, and user interface shows accurate progress and completion status.

title: Flexible Paper Builder - Manual Mode
description: Test manual paper creation where users drag and drop questions, reorder them, and save a custom question paper.

steps.description: Open paper builder and manually drag and drop at least 10 questions.
Reorder questions and apply custom metadata tags.
Save the created paper.
Verify that paper is saved correctly with question order and metadata preserved.

title: Flexible Paper Builder - AI-Assisted Smart Generation
description: Verify AI-assisted generation of question papers based on selected topics, difficulty, and marks constraints.

steps.description: Select topics, set difficulty level and total marks, then trigger AI smart generation of a paper.
Check that generated paper matches criteria and questions are contextually relevant.

title: Flexible Paper Builder - Template-Driven Quick Start
description: Validate paper creation using pre-defined professional templates with instant style switching and live preview.

steps.description: Choose a predefined template and apply it to generate a new question paper.
Switch among different templates and observe live preview updates.
Verify that the paper rendering updates immediately and correctly reflects selected template styles.

title: Multi-format Export Fidelity
description: Verify export of question papers preserves tables, images, equations, and formatting in DOCX, PDF, HTML, Markdown, and Google Docs formats.

steps.description: Export a paper containing complex tables, images, and equations to each supported format.
Open exported files and confirm visual fidelity and content accuracy for each format.

title: Visual Rich Content Editor - Table and Equation Editing
description: Test creation and modification of tables and equations within the WYSIWYG editor with accurate rendering and save functionality.

steps.description: Create a new question and embed a complex table using the visual editor.
Insert an equation, edit it visually, and save changes.
Confirm that edits to tables and equations are correctly saved and visually rendered in the editor.

title: Advanced Search and Filtering Interface
description: Verify rich search using multiple criteria and saved presets returns accurate and performant question lists.

steps.description: Input multiple search filters (topic, difficulty, marks, keywords) and perform search.
Ensure results match all criteria and are returned within 500 milliseconds.
Save the filter preset and later load it to repeat the search.
Confirm saved presets recall correct filters and results.

title: Session Management and Presentation Tools
description: Verify full-screen presentation mode supports timers, bookmarks, annotation tools, and prompts for unsaved changes.

steps.description: Start a question presentation session with timers and bookmarks.
Add annotations and attempt to navigate away without saving.
Check that unsaved changes prompt appears, and annotations persist after saving.

title: Interface Stability on Workflow Transitions
description: Ensure smooth, crash-free switching among input, review, generation, and preview stages with no data loss.

steps.description: Import content and proceed from extraction to question review, then to paper generation and preview.
Switch back and forth between stages multiple times.
Validate no crashes occur and all intermediate data states remain intact.

title: Security - Access Control and Data Encryption
description: Test role-based access control restricting unauthorized users and verify encryption of sensitive data at rest and in transit.

steps.description: Attempt data access as a user without required roles.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error message is shown.
Inspect database and API communication to check that sensitive data is encrypted.
Confirm encryption protocols are enforced as per industry standards.

title: Accessibility Compliance WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Validate application meets WCAG 2.1 Level AA using accessibility audit tools and keyboard navigation testing.

steps.description: Run automated accessibility audits on main interfaces.
Confirm no critical WCAG violations.
Navigate entire app using keyboard only.
Verify all interactive elements are accessible and usable via keyboard.
